name: MDN Editor (UI Tweaks)
description: tweaks for the UI of the MDN Editor. * the left panel with the `Source` and `Hide` buttons is changed to position sticky to prevent sliding above * the comment section is changed to be more compact and position absolute thus you could fill it while you edit the article * so the useful things are always at hand * source area settings: background color, font color, font family, font size * use the settings menu to change the colors and other on your choice use MDN Editor (Gray Toolbox) if you want to change color of the panels
